item.title: Ticket #1469 (typo in get_permalink() ) created
item.dc:creator: skippy
item.description:
The function get_permalink() contains the following on line 40: $post = & get_post($id);

It should be $post = & get_posts($id);

item.title: locale-patch.txt attached to Ticket #1468
item.dc:creator: firas
item.description: patch to take optional second argument for load_plugin_textdomain specifying path

item.title: Ticket #1468 (load_plugin_textdomain() should accept variable paths) created
item.dc:creator: firas
item.description: Currently, the load_plugin_textdomain() function is hardcoded to look under [ABSPATH . "wp-content/plugins/"] for a plugin's translation file. It should take an optional argument specifying the location of this file, such as wp-content/plugins/plugin-name/translations/ and so on.

item.title: Ticket #1460 (Need a post2cat entry for the about page post in install.php) updated
item.dc:creator: nbachiyski
item.description:
Version changed

Shouldn't the 'About page post' actually be an 'About' page and not a post? In its contents it is clearly stated, that it is a static page.

item.title: Ticket #1408 (comments_popup_link() returns incorrect URI when there are zero ...) updated
item.dc:creator: Kafkaesqui
item.description: This problem exists in the non-popup default comments template as well.

item.title: Ticket #1467 (foreach( $metavalues ) in pluggable-functions.php causes PHP warnings) updated
item.dc:creator: davidhouse

item.title: Ticket #1467 (foreach( $metavalues ) in pluggable-functions.php causes PHP warnings) created
item.dc:creator: davidhouse
item.description:
wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php:42 has a foreach() statement that loops over a user's meta. However, this gives warnings when creating a new user and when promoting a user from level 0 level 1. If you have PHP's ini setting display_errors set to 'on', it even causes a crash when promoting a user into an author as the header() call fails.

Patch: 

--- ../xmouse/wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php       2005-06-19 09:33:44.000000000 +0100
+++ wp-includes/pluggable-functions.php 2005-06-24 09:45:27.270279048 +0100
@@ -39,8 +39,10 @@
        $metavalues = $wpdb->get_results("SELECT meta_key, meta_value FROM $wpdb->usermeta WHERE user_id = '$user_id'");
-       foreach ( $metavalues as $meta )
-               $user->{$meta->meta_key} = $meta->meta_value;
+       if ($metavalues) {
+               foreach ( $metavalues as $meta )
+                       $user->{$meta->meta_key} = $meta->meta_value;
+       }
        $cache_userdata[$user_id] = $user;

item.title: Ticket #1466 (Bug) created
item.dc:creator: MikeWasHere05
item.description: There's a bug on my monitor, I just felt I should report it.
